title: Why are my LPQs looping?

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
For no reason whatsoever my LPQs are looping.

I'm grinding my way through the LPQs I recently got, however every time it reaches 20 minutes, it loops, so the 20 minute timer starts again even though I've been in queue for over 20 minutes.

This has happened MULTIPLE times.

It is unacceptable... Fix your game... It is not difficult...

**WHY IS THIS HAPPENING??? JUST DO YOUR STUPID JOBS**

replies.body: They're looking into this bug at the moment. No ETA yet and it's obviously a very frustrating bug but I'm afraid you'll just have to be patient for now.
